clinical_study.brief_title: The Efficacy of Kinesio Taping With Therapy in the Treatment of Globus Pharyngeus
clinical_study.official_title: The Efficacy of Kinesio Taping With Therapy in the Treatment of Globus Pharyngeus: a Randomized Sham-controlled Trial

lead_sponsor.agency: Prof. Dr. Cemil Tascıoglu Education and Research Hospital Organization

clinical_study.source: Prof. Dr. Cemil Tascıoglu Education and Research Hospital Organization

brief_summary.textblock: Globus pharyngeus or sensation may be defined as a feeling of something a lump in the throat without dysphagia. Kinesio tex tape is a medical tap developed by Dr. Kase for therapeutic purposes and has been widely used in physical therapy applications in recent years. Although it is not a treatment with full consensus, the patient's complaints can be corrected with a small number of different therapy techniques or regulations on life.

detailed_description.textblock: We conducted a therapy program with kinesio taping on patients who diagnosed with globus pharyngeus for 8 session with sham kinesio taping controlled group. This study aimed to assess of efficacy of the kinesio taping with therapy on patients patients who diagnosed with globus pharyngeus.

primary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of Glasgow Edinburg Throat Scale
primary_outcome.description: It was assessed by Turkish validated Glasgow Edinburg Throat Scale that a self questionnaire in globus pharyngeus patients. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 7 per question. The high scores were worst low scores were good.

The globus sense was assessed by visual analog scale. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 100 on a line as 100 millimetres . The high scores were worst low scores were good.

secondary_outcome.description: The Turkish validated questionnaire consists of 10 questions that scores are from 0 to 40. Low score is better, higher score is worse.

secondary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of voice handicap index - 10
secondary_outcome.description: It was assessed by Turkish validated voice handicap index - 10 that a self questionnaire in patients. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 4 per question. The high scores were worst low scores were good.

secondary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of voice handicap index - 10
secondary_outcome.description: It was assessed by Turkish validated voice handicap index - 10 that a self questionnaire in patients. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 4 per question. The high scores were worst low scores were good.

secondary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of reflux symptom index
secondary_outcome.description: The laryngopharyngeal reflux was assessed by Turkish validated reflux symptom index - 10 that a self questionnaire in patients. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 5 per question. The high scores were worst low scores were good.

secondary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of reflux symptom index
secondary_outcome.description: The laryngopharyngeal reflux was assessed by Turkish validated reflux symptom index - 10 that a self questionnaire in patients. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 5 per question. The high scores were worst low scores were good.

secondary_outcome.measure: The outcomes of reflux symptom index
secondary_outcome.description: The laryngopharyngeal reflux was assessed by Turkish validated reflux symptom index - 10 that a self questionnaire in patients. The minimum score is 0 and maximum score is 5 per question. The high scores were worst low scores were good.
The scale consists of 8 levels for assessment of penetration and aspiration. The scores are from 0 to 8. Low score is better, higher score is worse.

secondary_outcome.measure: Yale pharyngeal residue severity rating scale
secondary_outcome.description: The scale consists of 5 assessment units for pharyngeal residue. The scores are from 1 to 5. Low score is better, higher score is worse.

other_outcome.description: The median values of age and ratio of gender in all groups

arm_group.description: The therapy and Kinesio tex gold tape that was affixed to stretched and neck localised were applied
The therapy and Kinesio tex gold tape that was affixed to different neck localised as no-stretched were applied

intervention.description: The Kinesio tex tape is a medical tape that had been certified and patented.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- diagnosed with globus pharyngeus
- 18 -65 years
- give a consent form
Exclusion Criteria:
- patients with dysphagia or odynophagia
- laryngeal organic pathologies
- pharyngeal organic pathologies
- epiglottic retroversion
- malignancy
- pregnancy
- mental disorders
- neurological disorders
- major psychiatric disorders
- give not a consent form
